title: The 15 Best Designer Shoes Hiding on Amazon Prime
description: When we shop, convenience is key, and that's why Amazon tends to be our go-to. Those stylish flats you've been eyeing for weeks? They can be yours in just a few clicks, without having to drive to the mall or wait in any lines. Whether you're already familiar with Amazon's array of designer footwear or are exploring it for the first time, the selection is brimming with chic styles. What adds an extra layer of confidence to online shopping is Amazon's hassle-free return policy - there's basically no risk involved. As long as you haven't worn your shoes beyond a quick try-on, a full refund is just a return away. But that's not the only aspect we adore about shopping for shoes on Amazon. Brands are usually really good at providing ultra-specific sizing details, a convenient touch that's often lacking in traditional brick-and-mortar stores. All of this is to say that you're in good hands shopping for footwear of all kinds from Amazon's digital fashion department - and that goes for designer brands, too. The retailer carries so many you might not have realized, including Staud, Coach, Tory Burch, Loeffler Randall, and so many more. To prove it, we did a little searching and rounded up 15 pairs of designer shoes we've been eyeing, all of which are waiting for you on Amazon. Keep scrolling to shop a range of styles, including the best sneakers, boots, sandals, and more, at a wide range of price points.
author: Marisa Petrarca
excerpt: We rounded up the best designer shoes from Amazon.
text: Getty Images | Jeremy MoellerWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.When we shop, convenience is key, and that's why Amazon tends to be our go-to. Those stylish flats you've been eyeing for weeks? They can be yours in just a few clicks, without having to drive to the mall or wait in any lines. Whether you're already familiar with Amazon's array of designer footwear or are exploring it for the first time, the selection is brimming with chic styles. What adds an extra layer of confidence to online shopping is Amazon's hassle-free return policy — there's basically no risk involved. As long as you haven't worn your shoes beyond a quick try-on, a full refund is just a return away. But that's not the only aspect we adore about shopping for shoes on Amazon. Brands are usually really good at providing ultra-specific sizing details, a convenient touch that's often lacking in traditional brick-and-mortar stores. All of this is to say that you're in good hands shopping for footwear of all kinds from Amazon's digital fashion department — and that goes for designer brands, too. The retailer carries so many you might not have realized, including Staud, Coach, Tory Burch, Loeffler Randall, and so many more. To prove it, we did a little searching and rounded up 15 pairs of designer shoes we've been eyeing, all of which are waiting for you on Amazon. Keep scrolling to shop a range of styles, including the best sneakers, boots, sandals, and more, at a wide range of price points.amazon.comBest PumpsKarl Lagerfeld Paris Women's Royale Dress Pump ($65) A timeless pair of pumps is a great addition to every wardrobe, and these ones check all the boxes. Shoppers praise them for their comfort, which isn't exactly common for pumps. One Amazon shopper who rated them five stars wrote: "I'm a flight attendant, which means I walk literal miles in my heels. These don't hurt as much as other pairs I've owned." amazon.comBest Puffy HeelsJW PEI Women's Sara Mule Heeled Sandals ($89) Surely you're familiar with celebrity-loved JW Pei bags, but did you know the brand also carries footwear? Case in point: the Sara Mule Heeled Sandals are one of the brand's most popular styles, boasting a kitten heel and a puffy upper. Choose from neutrals like black and beige or vibrant hues such as pink and orange, and even more unconventional choices like denim blue, metallic silver, and a crystal-covered pair.amazon.comBest SlidesSam Edelman Women's Bambi Sandal ($90) If you're denim-obsessed and craving some retail therapy to refresh your spring-summer wardrobe, these sandals are exactly what you need. We love the idea of pairing them with your favorite jeans or shorts, but they come in other colors, too.amazon.comBest Mary JanesC.Paravano Mary Jane Shoes ($118-$128) It doesn't get much more darling than these Mary Janes. They're crafted in glossy vegan leather, boasting a mid-foot strap decorated with pearls. The brand carries them in several colors, but our favorite is this fire engine red hue.amazon.comBest SneakersCoach Women's Lowline Jacquard Low Top Sneaker ($125) Prefer designer sneakers to sporty ones? Amazon has your back with these low-top Coach sneakers covered in the label's signature "C" pattern. They're lightweight and feature a cushioned insole for maximum comfort.PS Photography | Marisa PetrarcaBest UGG BootsUGG Women's Classic Mini II Boot ($160) UGG might not be the first brand that comes to mind when you think of designer labels, but its undeniable popularity earns it a spot on our list. This pair, in particular, is adored for its fusion of style, warmth, and comfort. One editor swears by hers, describing them as "walking on clouds." Learn more via her UGG Women's Classic Mini II Boots review.Editor Quote: "As cliché as it sounds, wearing these boots genuinely feels like walking on clouds. They boast a thick sheepskin lining that strikes the perfect balance between warmth and comfort without making my feet sweaty. Although I wear them as everyday footwear, they outshine even my coziest slippers when it comes to comfort." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shoppingamazon.comBest Studded FlatsMadewell Women's The Beverley Mary Jane Flats ($168) Studded shoes are having a moment, and so are Mary Janes, so why not combine the two with this pair that'll take you from winter to spring? If you love the silhouette but prefer something without the studs, they also come in a leopard-print version (equally trendy right now), as well as solid off-white or red optionsamazon.comBest SandalsTory Burch Women's Miller Sandals ($198) You can't go wrong with owning these Tory Burch sandals. They go with everything and have a touch of cushioning in the footbed for added comfort. However, the standout feature is undoubtedly the brand's signature logo.amazon.comBest Platform BootsDr. Martens Jadon 8-Eye Leather Platform Boot for Men and Women ($200, originally $210) Again, Dr. Martens might not be the first brand that comes to mind when you think of designer footwear, but with over 6,000 five-star ratings across men's and women's styles, its popularity easily rivals more traditional luxury labels. While they take a little time to break in, once they do, they'll be your most comfortable pair — one that'll last for years.amazon.comBest Leopard PumpsKate Spade New York Women's Maritza Pump ($206, originally $258) We're seriously obsessed with these leopard pumps. Whether you're styling them for a street style moment or a night out, they strike the perfect balance between luxury and fun.amazon.comBest Block-Heel BootsSchutz Women's Maryana Block Boots ($245, originally $258) These block-heel boots are perfect for transitioning from winter to spring. The croc-embossed leather adds just the right amount of texture, and they'll elevate everything from jeans to dresses.amazon.comBest Pointy FlatsLarroudé Grace Flat ($315) What's not to love about these pointed-toe flats? Whether they're stepping up your work wardrobe or making weekend appearances, expect plenty of "Where did you get those?" inquiries from friends and strangers alike. And while the pointed toe might seem intimidating, the memory foam footbed makes them just as comfy as they are chic. amazon.comBest Heeled SandalsLoeffler Randall Women's Camellia Heeled Sandal ($395) You'll find so many ways to wear these heeled sandals, whether to dress up jeans or complete your wedding guest look. The pleated organza fabric and bow are signature details cherished by the luxury label, adding a timelessly feminine touch. amazon.comBest Crochet HeelsStaud Women's Simone Crochet Heels ($395) These crochet heels are an instant compliment magnet if we've ever seen one. Everything from the unique stacked block heel and crocheted vamp encapsulates luxury. Just think of how well they'll complement your summer wardrobe. amazon.comBest Over-the-Knee BootsStuart Weitzman Women's 5050 Flat Boots ($449-$795) Ultra-tall boots are having a moment, and while these Stuart Weitzman boots are a serious investment, they're the kind you'll wear on repeat. Whether you're bringing back skinny jeans or need a stylish yet comfy option for dresses, they go with everything. Bonus: They come in a variety of colors and textures.Marisa Petrarca (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has over seven years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. She was previously the senior beauty editor at Grazia USA and the style and beauty editor at Us Weekly. Now freelancing, her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, Marie Claire, and more. When she's not working on a story, you can probably find her testing the latest makeup, skin-care, or hair launches. Marisa lives in Saint Paul, MN, with her husband and their corgi, Cooper.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

When we shop, convenience is key, and that's why Amazon tends to be our go-to. Those stylish flats you've been eyeing for weeks? They can be yours in just a few clicks, without having to drive to the mall or wait in any lines. Whether you're already familiar with Amazon's array of designer footwear or are exploring it for the first time, the selection is brimming with chic styles. What adds an extra layer of confidence to online shopping is Amazon's hassle-free return policy — there's basically no risk involved. As long as you haven't worn your shoes beyond a quick try-on, a full refund is just a return away.

But that's not the only aspect we adore about shopping for shoes on Amazon. Brands are usually really good at providing ultra-specific sizing details, a convenient touch that's often lacking in traditional brick-and-mortar stores. All of this is to say that you're in good hands shopping for footwear of all kinds from Amazon's digital fashion department — and that goes for designer brands, too. The retailer carries so many you might not have realized, including Staud, Coach, Tory Burch, Loeffler Randall, and so many more. To prove it, we did a little searching and rounded up 15 pairs of designer shoes we've been eyeing, all of which are waiting for you on Amazon. Keep scrolling to shop a range of styles, including the best sneakers, boots, sandals, and more, at a wide range of price points.

Best Pumps

Karl Lagerfeld Paris Women's Royale Dress Pump ($65)

A timeless pair of pumps is a great addition to every wardrobe, and these ones check all the boxes. Shoppers praise them for their comfort, which isn't exactly common for pumps. One Amazon shopper who rated them five stars wrote: "I'm a flight attendant, which means I walk literal miles in my heels. These don't hurt as much as other pairs I've owned."

Best Puffy Heels

JW PEI Women's Sara Mule Heeled Sandals ($89)

Surely you're familiar with celebrity-loved JW Pei bags, but did you know the brand also carries footwear? Case in point: the Sara Mule Heeled Sandals are one of the brand's most popular styles, boasting a kitten heel and a puffy upper. Choose from neutrals like black and beige or vibrant hues such as pink and orange, and even more unconventional choices like denim blue, metallic silver, and a crystal-covered pair.

Best Slides

Sam Edelman Women's Bambi Sandal ($90)

If you're denim-obsessed and craving some retail therapy to refresh your spring-summer wardrobe, these sandals are exactly what you need. We love the idea of pairing them with your favorite jeans or shorts, but they come in other colors, too.

Best Mary Janes

C.Paravano Mary Jane Shoes ($118-$128)

It doesn't get much more darling than these Mary Janes. They're crafted in glossy vegan leather, boasting a mid-foot strap decorated with pearls. The brand carries them in several colors, but our favorite is this fire engine red hue.

Best Sneakers

Coach Women's Lowline Jacquard Low Top Sneaker ($125)

Prefer designer sneakers to sporty ones? Amazon has your back with these low-top Coach sneakers covered in the label's signature "C" pattern. They're lightweight and feature a cushioned insole for maximum comfort.

Best UGG Boots

UGG Women's Classic Mini II Boot ($160)

UGG might not be the first brand that comes to mind when you think of designer labels, but its undeniable popularity earns it a spot on our list. This pair, in particular, is adored for its fusion of style, warmth, and comfort. One editor swears by hers, describing them as "walking on clouds." Learn more via her UGG Women's Classic Mini II Boots review.

Editor Quote: "As cliché as it sounds, wearing these boots genuinely feels like walking on clouds. They boast a thick sheepskin lining that strikes the perfect balance between warmth and comfort without making my feet sweaty. Although I wear them as everyday footwear, they outshine even my coziest slippers when it comes to comfort." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shopping

Best Studded Flats

Madewell Women's The Beverley Mary Jane Flats ($168)

Studded shoes are having a moment, and so are Mary Janes, so why not combine the two with this pair that'll take you from winter to spring? If you love the silhouette but prefer something without the studs, they also come in a leopard-print version (equally trendy right now), as well as solid off-white or red options

Best Sandals

Tory Burch Women's Miller Sandals ($198)

You can't go wrong with owning these Tory Burch sandals. They go with everything and have a touch of cushioning in the footbed for added comfort. However, the standout feature is undoubtedly the brand's signature logo.

Best Platform Boots

Dr. Martens Jadon 8-Eye Leather Platform Boot for Men and Women ($200, originally $210)

Again, Dr. Martens might not be the first brand that comes to mind when you think of designer footwear, but with over 6,000 five-star ratings across men's and women's styles, its popularity easily rivals more traditional luxury labels. While they take a little time to break in, once they do, they'll be your most comfortable pair — one that'll last for years.

Best Leopard Pumps

Kate Spade New York Women's Maritza Pump ($206, originally $258)

We're seriously obsessed with these leopard pumps. Whether you're styling them for a street style moment or a night out, they strike the perfect balance between luxury and fun.

Best Block-Heel Boots

Schutz Women's Maryana Block Boots ($245, originally $258)

These block-heel boots are perfect for transitioning from winter to spring. The croc-embossed leather adds just the right amount of texture, and they'll elevate everything from jeans to dresses.

Best Pointy Flats

Larroudé Grace Flat ($315)

What's not to love about these pointed-toe flats? Whether they're stepping up your work wardrobe or making weekend appearances, expect plenty of "Where did you get those?" inquiries from friends and strangers alike. And while the pointed toe might seem intimidating, the memory foam footbed makes them just as comfy as they are chic.

Best Heeled Sandals

Loeffler Randall Women's Camellia Heeled Sandal ($395)

You'll find so many ways to wear these heeled sandals, whether to dress up jeans or complete your wedding guest look. The pleated organza fabric and bow are signature details cherished by the luxury label, adding a timelessly feminine touch.

Best Crochet Heels

Staud Women's Simone Crochet Heels ($395)

These crochet heels are an instant compliment magnet if we've ever seen one. Everything from the unique stacked block heel and crocheted vamp encapsulates luxury. Just think of how well they'll complement your summer wardrobe.

Best Over-the-Knee Boots

Stuart Weitzman Women's 5050 Flat Boots ($449-$795)

Ultra-tall boots are having a moment, and while these Stuart Weitzman boots are a serious investment, they're the kind you'll wear on repeat. Whether you're bringing back skinny jeans or need a stylish yet comfy option for dresses, they go with everything. Bonus: They come in a variety of colors and textures.

Marisa Petrarca (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has over seven years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. She was previously the senior beauty editor at Grazia USA and the style and beauty editor at Us Weekly. Now freelancing, her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, Marie Claire, and more. When she's not working on a story, you can probably find her testing the latest makeup, skin-care, or hair launches. Marisa lives in Saint Paul, MN, with her husband and their corgi, Cooper.
